description: Irregular triangular array T read by rows: T(n,k) = C(n,k) for k=0..n for n = 0,1,2,3. For n >= 4, T(n,0) = T(n,2n)=1, T(n,1) = T(n,2n-1) = n - 3, T(4,2) = 4, T(4,3) = 3, T(4,4) = 6; T(4,5) = 3, T(4,6)=4; for n >= 5, T(n,k) = T(n-1,k-2) + T(n-1,k-1) + T(n-1,k) for k=2..2n-2.
comments: For n >= 4, T(n,k) = number of strings s(0)..s(n) such that s(n) = n - k, s(0) = 0, |s(i)-s(i-1)| = 1 for i=1,2,3 and |s(i)-s(i-1)| <= 1 for i >= 4.
links: Index entries for triangles and arrays related to Pascal's triangle
